beginning: ^You, a weary traveler in search of the one they call Mark Yun, are nearing the journeyâ€™s end.

c-0: ^In your sight, the wizardâ€™s tower beckons; a flickering beacon in otherwise a murky night.
^"At last..." With a final rally, you decide to finish out your journey.
c-1: ^You try to give in to your defeatist attitude but a narrative push compels you to trudge onwards.

at_tower_door: ^The wizard's refuge is more quaint than you expected, a weathered stone spire stabilized by what appears to a cottage. Both the ground level window and sky-high tower veranda are lit by the same orange shimmer.
^You face it's wooden door with anticipation.

c-0: ^A courteous move. You knock on the door three times. On the final knock, you notice that the door is unlocked.
c-1: ^Creak... You open the unlocked door to the wizards castle. The candle-lit abode welcomes you with its warm, albeit faded glow.
c-2: ^A precise, disapproving narrative gust slaps you on the face, clearly showing you that you are at the point of no return.
